SELECT u.user_no as userNo, u.user_name AS userName, 'yes' AS choice, SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'yes' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS sum FROM tbl_betting_order bo JOIN tbl_user u ON bo.order_user_no = u.user_no WHERE bo.order_subject_no = #{ subjectNo } GROUP BY u.user_name, u.user_no HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'yes' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT u.user_no as userNo, u.user_name AS userName, 'no' AS choice, SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'no' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS sum FROM tbl_betting_order bo JOIN tbl_user u ON bo.order_user_no = u.user_no WHERE bo.order_subject_no = #{ subjectNo } GROUP BY u.user_name, u.user_no HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'no' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY choice, sum

SELECT SUM(bo.order_amount) AS totalPoints FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userId} AND bo.order_timestamp BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND NOW()

-- 사용자의 수익 포인트와 손실 포인트 계산 SELECT bo.order_user_no as user_no, bo.order_amount, bo.order_choice, c.subject_total_yes_point, c.subject_total_no_point, c.subject_finish_result, bo.order_timestamp, c.subject_title, c.subject_no, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END AS profit_points, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN bo.order_amount WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END AS loss_points FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE bo.order_user_no = #{userId} AND bo.order_timestamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND c.subject_status = '완료';

-- 사용자의 수익 포인트와 손실 포인트 계산 SELECT SUM(profit_points) AS total_profit_points, SUM(loss_points) AS total_loss_points, SUM(profit_points) - SUM(loss_points) AS net_profit_points FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END AS profit_points, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN bo.order_amount WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END AS loss_points FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE bo.order_user_no = #{userId} AND bo.order_timestamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND c.subject_status = '완료' ) AS UserBettingData;

SELECT bo.order_user_no as user_no, bo.order_amount, bo.order_choice, c.subject_total_yes_point, c.subject_total_no_point, c.subject_title, c.subject_no, c.subject_finish_result, bo.order_timestamp, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END AS current_position_value FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE bo.order_user_no = #{userId} AND c.subject_status = '진행중';

SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END ) AS total_position_value FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_betting_order ( order_amount, order_choice, order_subject_no, order_user_no ) VALUES ( #{orderAmount}, #{orderChoice}, #{orderSubjectNo}, #{orderUserNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_AMOUNT , A.ORDER_CHOICE , A.ORDER_TIMESTAMP , B.USER_NO , B.USER_NAME , C.SUBJECT_NO , C.SUBJECT_TITLE , D.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NO AS USER_ATTACHMENT_FILE_NO , D.ATTACHMENT_FILE_ADDRESS AS USER_ATTACHMENT_FILE_ADDRESS , E.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NO AS SUBJECT_ATTACHMENT_FILE_NO , E.ATTACHMENT_FILE_ADDRESS AS SUBJECT_ATTACHMENT_FILE_ADDRESS FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.ORDER_USER_NO = B.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_SUBJECT C ON A.ORDER_SUBJECT_NO = C.SUBJECT_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT D ON A.ORDER_USER_NO = D.ATTACHMENT_USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT E ON A.ORDER_SUBJECT_NO = E.SUBJECT_NO WHERE B.USER_AUTHORITY = 'ROLE_USER' ORDER BY A.ORDER_TIMESTAMP DESC

WITH RECURSIVE TimeSeries AS ( -- 가장 늦게 주문한 시간을 기준으로 다음 시간을 계산 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD((SELECT MAX(order_timestamp) FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo}), INTERVAL 1 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 HOUR), n + 1 FROM TimeSeries WHERE n < 10 ), OrderSummary AS ( -- 각 displayTime에 해당하는 주문 요약 SELECT T.displayTime, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'Yes' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'No' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS noAmount, SUM(O.order_amount) AS totalAmount FROM TimeSeries T LEFT JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER O ON O.order_timestamp < T.displayTime AND O.order_subject_no = ${subjectNo} GROUP BY T.displayTime ) SELECT displayTime, IFNULL((yesAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS yesRate, IFNULL((noAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS noRate FROM OrderSummary ORDER BY displayTime DESC;

WITH RECURSIVE TimeSeries AS ( -- 가장 늦게 주문한 시간을 기준으로 다음 시간을 계산 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD((SELECT MAX(order_timestamp) FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo}), INTERVAL 6 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 6 HOUR), n + 1 FROM TimeSeries WHERE n < 10 ), OrderSummary AS ( -- 각 displayTime에 해당하는 주문 요약 SELECT T.displayTime, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'Yes' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'No' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS noAmount, SUM(O.order_amount) AS totalAmount FROM TimeSeries T LEFT JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER O ON O.order_timestamp < T.displayTime AND O.order_subject_no = ${subjectNo} GROUP BY T.displayTime ) SELECT displayTime, IFNULL((yesAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS yesRate, IFNULL((noAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS noRate FROM OrderSummary ORDER BY displayTime DESC;

WITH RECURSIVE TimeSeries AS ( -- 가장 늦게 주문한 시간을 기준으로 다음 시간을 계산 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD((SELECT MAX(order_timestamp) FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo}), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 DAY), n + 1 FROM TimeSeries WHERE n < 10 ), OrderSummary AS ( -- 각 displayTime에 해당하는 주문 요약 SELECT T.displayTime, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'Yes' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'No' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS noAmount, SUM(O.order_amount) AS totalAmount FROM TimeSeries T LEFT JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER O ON O.order_timestamp < T.displayTime AND O.order_subject_no = ${subjectNo} GROUP BY T.displayTime ) SELECT displayTime, IFNULL((yesAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS yesRate, IFNULL((noAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS noRate FROM OrderSummary ORDER BY displayTime DESC;

WITH RECURSIVE TimeSeries AS ( -- 가장 늦게 주문한 시간을 기준으로 다음 시간을 계산 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD((SELECT MAX(order_timestamp) FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo}), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 7 DAY), n + 1 FROM TimeSeries WHERE n < 10 ), OrderSummary AS ( -- 각 displayTime에 해당하는 주문 요약 SELECT T.displayTime, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'Yes' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'No' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS noAmount, SUM(O.order_amount) AS totalAmount FROM TimeSeries T LEFT JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER O ON O.order_timestamp < T.displayTime AND O.order_subject_no = ${subjectNo} GROUP BY T.displayTime ) SELECT displayTime, IFNULL((yesAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS yesRate, IFNULL((noAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS noRate FROM OrderSummary ORDER BY displayTime DESC

WITH RECURSIVE TimeSeries AS ( -- 가장 늦게 주문한 시간을 기준으로 다음 시간을 계산 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD((SELECT MAX(order_timestamp) FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo}), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), n + 1 FROM TimeSeries WHERE n < 10 ), OrderSummary AS ( -- 각 displayTime에 해당하는 주문 요약 SELECT T.displayTime, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'Yes' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'No' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS noAmount, SUM(O.order_amount) AS totalAmount FROM TimeSeries T LEFT JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER O ON O.order_timestamp < T.displayTime AND O.order_subject_no = ${subjectNo} GROUP BY T.displayTime ) SELECT displayTime, IFNULL((yesAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS yesRate, IFNULL((noAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS noRate FROM OrderSummary ORDER BY displayTime DESC

WITH OrderedTimes AS ( SELECT order_timestamp FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} ORDER BY order_timestamp ), TimeSeries AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS row_num, COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_rows FROM OrderedTimes ), DividedTimes AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, row_num, total_rows, NTILE(10) OVER (ORDER BY row_num) AS tile FROM TimeSeries ), FinalTimes AS ( SELECT MAX(order_timestamp) AS displayTime FROM DividedTimes GROUP BY tile ), OrderSummary AS ( SELECT F.displayTime, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'Yes' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN O.order_choice = 'No' THEN O.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS noAmount, SUM(O.order_amount) AS totalAmount FROM FinalTimes F LEFT JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER O ON O.order_timestamp <= F.displayTime AND O.order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} GROUP BY F.displayTime ) SELECT displayTime, IFNULL((yesAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS yesRate, IFNULL((noAmount / totalAmount) * 100, 0) AS noRate FROM OrderSummary ORDER BY displayTime DESC;
